channel.description: WEBSITE: http://freewebs.com/radiofan92 Hosts Marcus and Damian link up Fridays at 9:30 PM Central Time to host The Broadband Brothers, a talk show where comedy rules and the talk is open! Feel free to call or email in for advice, to join on the fun, or to ask a question. This is an open talk show! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: Marcus
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Broadband Brothers

item.title: The Broadband Brothers - January 31, 2009
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Marcus and a special co-host discuss the dumb criminals of the week, the crappy economy, amazing news, and the Hall of Shame.
item.itunes:author: Marcus

item.title: The Broadband Brothers - December 14, 2008
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: Josh and Marcus join in this prerecorded show to laugh about the week's news and discuss Cartoon Network's new online game (MMORPG), FusionFall.

item.title: The Broadband Brothers - November 14, 2008
item.author: info@talkshoe.com
item.description: This week, we debut a couple new segments, and even have a surprise guest! Also, Damian talks about antics at school, while Marcus is a bit annoyed by something he noticed earlier that day. Plus, of course, great comedy and talk!
